%s Your lunch break will expire at %s. Bon appétit!
%s Welcome back to work!
%s Your default expiration time was successfully set to %s.
%s Slow down, my friend! Your default expiration time is already set to %s.

Use %%code{/lunch} to tell your team members that you're at lunch break. Some examples:
• %%code{/lunch}: Start or end your lunch break (default: %s minutes, your setting: %s minute%s) • %%code{/lunch 30}: Start your lunch break for 30 minutes • %%code{/lunch default 30}: Set your default lunch break time to 30 minutes • %%code{/lunch default unset}: Unset your default lunch break time
